features: 💧 Manuka Essential Oil Body Wash: Harness the unique strength of New Zealand Manuka, 20x more potent than Australian tea tree oil. Ideal for fighting body odor, jock itch, yeast infections, and more. This antifungal and antimicrobial body wash is also infused with tea tree and mint, making it perfect for both men and women. A powerful wash, safe for skin conditions like folliculitis and tinea versicolor. It doubles as an effective tea tree foot wash, offering a natural detox solution for daily

🌿 Proprietary Therapeutic Essential Oil Blend: Specially developed for the AIP community with heightened autoimmunity and skin sensitivities + allergies. This tea tree oil body wash offers a soothing antifungal, antibacterial solution perfect for itchy skin relief, jock itch, body odor, and more. Safe for skin care with eczema, psoriasis, and fungal infections, it's the ideal tea tree and mint body wash for sensitive skin.

👣 Therapeutic Foot + Body Deep Cleanse: This tea tree body wash powerfully and naturally cleanses, combating tough odors while gently nourishing the skin. Moisture Replenishing, it's enriched with vegetable glycerin to naturally restore the skin's moisture, ideal for a clean wash while combating jock itch, body odor, and foot fungal infections.
🌟 Israeli Dead Sea Salt Body Wash: Rich in essential minerals, this unique body wash effectively soothes skin with the natural benefits of 100% pure Dead Sea salt.

✨ AIP Friendly for All Skin Types: Specially formulated for sensitive, eczema, and psoriasis-prone skin, this all-natural body wash is free from parabens, SLS, PEGs, and artificial fragrances. It's perfectly suited for anyone in the AIP community, ensuring gentle care without any synthetic ingredients. Ethically produced with no animal testing, it's a safe and soothing choice for every skin type.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A part of our Manuka Defense line, Balm of Gilead’s Manuka Defense Deep Cleanse Body + Foot Wash is an all natural, all-in-one body wash infused with a proprietary, therapeutic blend of odor-fighting essential oils, while deeply cleansing the skin with plant-based surfactants, and nourishing with natural glycerin and Dead Sea salts. Stay clean with a natural, powerful odor-fighting proprietary infusion of New Zealand Manuka Oil, Australian Tea Tree, Australian Eucalyptus, Spanish Rosemary, Japanese Peppermint, and Israeli Dead Sea Salts. Pure. Unadulterated. Original. Balm of Gilead. DIRECTIONS: Therapeutic foot and body wash for use in the shower. In case of contact with eyes, rinse with clean water immediately. If irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children.

Manuka Defense - Manuka Healing Balm Manuka Defense - Healing Lip Balm Manuka Defense - Deep Cleanse Odor-Fighting Wash Manuka Eczema Honey Cream - Autoimmune Dry Skin Relief Eucalyptus + Tea Tree Cream - Advanced Soothing Cream Benefits A proprietary balm, enriched with lanolin for longer lasting moisture and healing for the hands and feet and where you need it most. Lip soothing, healing and protecting for long-lasting care. Lock in moisture with organic beeswax and lanolin. Powerful, natural, odor-fighting foot and body wash powered by a proprietary and therapeutic blend of essential oils and Israeli Dead Sea Salts. Intensive skin healing - scientifically formulated for autoimmune dry skin relief, including those with eczema, psoriasis, rosacea, dermatitis, and ultra sensitive skin, etc. Advanced softening, soothing for dry, itchy, scaly skin including callused feet, elbows, knees, irritated skin and nails, jock itch, etc. Application Hands + Feet Lips Body Body Body Fast Acting ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ For All Skin Types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Grail of Skin Care
reviews.reviewText: I have psoriasis, eczema and overall sensitive skin. So I've been through the gamut of creams, prescriptions and lotions. When comparing the all natural ingredients combined with a relative affordable price, you can't go wrong. The more I learn about Manuka honey and oil the more I'm wooed by the potential of this somewhat rare product. I also think using purified tallow is much better for your skin than petroleum jelly.It soothes the itch, heals cuts, and moisturizes. I will say unless you really work into your skin repeatedly it will take 30 - 45 minutes for the balm to soak in. It's not a quick absorbing material like your standard lotion from the store. I also use Aveeno oatmeal lotion and that gets absorbed within minutes but doesn't have the long-lasting (that I feel) is a skin rebuilding barrier.Manuka oil is the last item in the ingredient list so probably isn't as plentiful as other products that tout Munuka honey as their primary ingredient. That said, those other items are also 2 or 3x more expensive. I've never been one, despite my skin ailments, to drop $50 or $100 on skin care products. I find this Healing Balm is a happy medium with price and quality. I will be definitely be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been losing hair due to a scalp fungus for nearly 2 years. This product cleared away the fungus completely in 3 weeks of use. No more itching or scales. I use it to cleanse my whole body. I have absolutely no complaint about this product. I have recommended it to my friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does it heal?
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say for a fact that it is actively healing my skin, but I can say that I do like how it makes my skin look and feel. However, it does have a bit of a grainy texture to it. But it does melt into your skin. So once you get passed that, you should be fine. It also has a strong scent. I’m sure because of the ingredients. I just needed something to help with the skin abscess and it has been keeping it moisturized. As for healing, I’m not sure entirely. Still would recommend for dry skin if you want something more “natural”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Pits are happy!
reviews.reviewText: Only used it twice so far on my under arms and it worked wonders! It has a subtle, pleasant scent after being washed off. I've switched to natural deodorant so the struggle not to smell after a few hours has been real. This has helped to make me smell good all day. No having to reapply my deodorant in the afternoon. I'm going to use it only in the areas that have the most smells- hairy places. As someone else mentioned, it doesnt suds much or for very long. I'm okay with that because I am going to be using it in certain areas and not my whole body. If I was going to use it fully, I wouldn't be happy with the lack of suds. I have other cleansers to meet that need though. I feel confident that I will smell good even through the next morning now. And with there being Manuka oil as well as other oils in it, I am hoping it helps with HS flares. But even if it doesn't, I'll still be using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't lather almost at all, so you end up having to use like 1/4th of the bottle to get the job done when bathing. Also worth noting that it burns like icy hot which can be a surprise if you're not expecting it. Would be bad to get in the eyes. Otherwise seems as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Antibacterial, antifungal, moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my adult son's skin condition. On his face, bald area on scalp, eyebrows, etc. he has dry flaky irritated skin. I'm thinking it may be fungal but not sure. He's been to a derm and got very expensive shampoo which didn't do much.This is helping. So far he's only been applying to forehead but he's beginning to go further.It does have a strong tea smell but it disappears fairly soon.It is EXTREMELY moisturizing. When I first got it I applied some to a small area and practically never got it off my hands. So if you want it somewhere it's going to stay there.I have high hopes this will work in several other areas too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is a good bargain and works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MANUKA DEFENSE Healing Balm
reviews.reviewText: WOW !! This Amazing product has the most healing properties, hands down, that I have ever seen or experienced in all of my 56 years !I am blown away completely at the ability this wonderful balm has to heal, protect, restore, and soothe distressed skin. Even the sensitive, fragile, delicate, skin of your face. I've read about the Medicinal properties of the Manuka Honey from New Zealand .. How it is anti-bacterial, anti-fungal, anti-Microbial, also, how it has the ability to be anti-inflammatory as well. And the added ingredients of this healing balm make it such a pleasure to use. It WORKS !! And that is a Mild Understatement.I would advise anyone who is experiencing irritated skin to give this product a try. It could possibly work as well for you as it has for me. Not only will I continue to use this balm, I also intend to purchase a large container of 'CERTIFIED MANUKA HONEY' from New Zealand and add it to my diet too.Terry B
